title: YARD / HANGED MAN BULLET
description:
This is the final phase of the hanged man:
1. White check to find bullet
2. Failure to find fridge
3. Bagging him and taking it away

dialogueTree.title: Perception: "Your arm reaches out and your eyes..."
dialogueTree.text: Your arm reaches out and your eyes close, as if by their own volition. It's dark all around. You feel cold, slippery flesh -- first with your fingertips, then under the palm of your hand.

links.title: You: "What is this?"
links.text: What is this?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "His face. His cheeks, his nose, his..."
links.text: His face. His cheeks, his nose, his fat swollen lips. Like a spider, your hand crawls over his features. Everything is silent.

links.title: You: "Put your fingers in his mouth."
links.text: Put your fingers in his mouth.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The oral cavity is cold and moist...."
links.text: The oral cavity is cold and moist. A ball-like tongue attaches itself to the base of the mouth, lolling around like a scallop...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You're on the right track."
links.text: You're on the right track.

links.title: You: "Play with it -- this feels right."
links.text: Play with it -- this feels right.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The tongue moves freely in the cavi..."
links.text: The tongue moves freely in the cavity. The mucous of the mouth is slippery, delicate to touch. From the soft meat -- teeth are budding; hard pearls of bone in the gums. And in the back of the mouth...

links.title: Perception: "Can you feel it? You're so close! R..."
links.text: Can you feel it? You're so close! Rip his jaws open now, look in...

links.title: You: "Open your eyes and look."
links.text: Open your eyes and look.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "A vision of black and dark red deat..."
links.text: A vision of black and dark red death, pried open by your naked hands and studded with teeth. Looks like he's laughing, death fumes rising from the throat. And there, in the back of his mouth, above the bell of the uvula, right in the soft palate...

links.title: Perception: "...you see a hole, barely visible t..."
links.text: ...you see a hole, barely visible to the human eye. It is swollen shut, almost vanished, no larger than 0.4 cm in radius. The edges appear darkened.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "An *abrasion collar*! THIS is what..."
links.text: An *abrasion collar*! THIS is what we're after.

links.title: You: "Say: "Abrasion collar.""
links.text: Say: "Abrasion collar."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see it..." The lieutenant looks..."
links.text: "I see it..." The lieutenant looks in. There's a pen in his hand. His notebook is open at the red pages.

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno is silent."
links.text: Cuno is silent.

links.title: You: "Say: "Fuck yeah.""
links.text: Say: "Fuck yeah."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm," he agrees. "Keep going.""
links.text: "Mhm," he agrees. "Keep going."

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno nods too. He takes a step clos..."
links.text: Cuno nods too. He takes a step closer.

links.title: You: "Touch it with your finger, gently...."
links.text: Touch it with your finger, gently. (Proceed.)

links.title: The Hanged Man: "A black trickle of liquid runs into..."
links.text: A black trickle of liquid runs into his throat from the wound...

links.title: You: "Put your finger in."
links.text: Put your finger in.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your index fits right in there. A t..."
links.text: Your index fits right in there. A tight tunnel of flesh opens up -- tissue damage -- wide enough for two fingers. As you push both in, you reach through his mouth, right into his brain stem.

links.title: You: "Brain stem?"
links.text: Brain stem?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Yes. That's what this part is calle..."
links.text: Yes. That's what this part is called.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You've seen the drawings. You've st..."
links.text: You've seen the drawings. You've studied them.

links.title: You: "Feel around first."
links.text: Feel around first.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The basal ganglia feels clumpy -- w..."
links.text: The basal ganglia feels clumpy -- what entered here has torn apart his reptilian complex.

links.title: Conceptualization: "This man will never sleep again. Ne..."
links.text: This man will never sleep again. Never wake.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The *funk soul brother* at the back..."
links.text: The *funk soul brother* at the back of his head has gone dark. Forever.

links.title: You: "Push deeper."
links.text: Push deeper.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your fingers slide into the remains..."
links.text: Your fingers slide into the remains of his limbic system. There is no resistance. It's gelatinous. The slug-like structures are damaged too, the tearing extends deep into both hemispheres.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "This is what he used to regulate hi..."
links.text: This is what he used to regulate his emotions with...

links.title: Inland Empire: "The ululations of the limbic system..."
links.text: The ululations of the limbic system have ended. All is quiet.

links.title: You: ""There's a cavity... cut right betw..."
links.text: "There's a cavity... cut right between the hemispheres."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant answers with the sou..."
links.text: The lieutenant answers with the sound of his pen on paper.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuckin' *CAVITY* C..." Cuno's voic..."
links.text: "Fuckin' *CAVITY* C..." Cuno's voice is hushed.

links.title: Empathy: "Quivering with awe."
links.text: Quivering with awe.

links.title: You: "Push deeper."
links.text: Push deeper.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your fingers are all the way in now..."
links.text: Your fingers are all the way in now, reaching toward the inside of his skull. The cavity goes further, but the entry wound isn't wide enough for the rest of your hand to follow...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "All the muscles in your body harden..."
links.text: All the muscles in your body harden. Time to *enter* him.

links.title: You: "Punch a hole through his mouth."
links.text: Punch a hole through his mouth.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The cartilage gives in with a crack..."
links.text: The cartilage gives in with a crack, like some fruit. Just like that your hand is in his head. Strange fluid streams down your wrist -- and then you feel it, with the tip of your finger...

links.title: Perception: "Sharp, serrated material. The edges..."
links.text: Sharp, serrated material. The edges cut right into your skin.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain is barely noticeable under..."
links.text: The pain is barely noticeable under the adrenaline rush.

links.title: You: "Fish it out."
links.text: Fish it out.

links.title: Interfacing: "You pick the object between your in..."
links.text: You pick the object between your index and middle finger. It feels sharp, like metal. With your face twisting from pain and concentration, all you need to do is just...

links.title: You: "Whisper: "I got it.""
links.text: Whisper: "I got it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good-good..." The fridge in the ba..."
links.text: "Good-good..." The fridge in the background buzzes with excitement.

links.title: Cuno: ""My pig's fucking *got* it!""
links.text: "My pig's fucking *got* it!"

links.title: Authority: "He's watching his old man get the b..."
links.text: He's watching his old man get the big prize at the claw game.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""What?! WHAT is it?""
links.text: "What?! WHAT is it?"

links.title: You: "Slowly pull your fingers out..."
links.text: Slowly pull your fingers out...

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The inside of the head feels cold a..."
links.text: The inside of the head feels cold and smooth like a glove as you pull out, sweat dripping down your brow -- careful not to lose the prize between your fingers...

links.title: The Hanged Man: "With a *plop*, your hand emerges fr..."
links.text: With a *plop*, your hand emerges from the mouth, covered in blood up to the wrist. Between your fingers -- a small flower, a blossom made of lead!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A bullet..." The lieutenant puts a..."
links.text: "A bullet..." The lieutenant puts a small bag marked *evidence* under it.

links.title: You: "Drop it in."
links.text: Drop it in.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The bullet falls in the bag leaving..."
links.text: The bullet falls in the bag leaving a smattering of blood on the plastic. He raises the bag under his eyes and says:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unknown calibre. Rifled. Some kind..."
links.text: "Unknown calibre. Rifled. Some kind of brittle alloy, fractured on impact..."

links.title: You: ""Can I have it?""
links.text: "Can I have it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. You've *earned* it." Th..."
links.text: "Of course. You've *earned* it." The lieutenant drops the bag in your bloody hand. It feels light.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We need to add an item to the inju..."
links.text: "We need to add an item to the injury list." He turns to his notebook. "Injury #4: Oval entry wound with an abrasion collar. Soft palate, back of mouth."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""High velocity, temporary cavity in..."
links.text: "High velocity, temporary cavity in brain tissue. Small exit wound on the occiput." He underlines the injury, forcefully. "How does that sound?"

links.title: You: ""Sounds like heaven.""
links.text: "Sounds like heaven."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Opinion -- fatal injury.""
links.text: "Opinion -- fatal injury."

links.title: You: ""This concurs with the Hardie boys..."
links.text: "This concurs with the Hardie boys story."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And one last thing." *Click-click*..."
links.text: "And one last thing." *Click-click* goes the pen. "We can now fill in injury #3: ligament mark. Opinion -- non-fatal, post-mortem: *treatment*."

links.title: You: ""I think I need to wash myself.""
links.text: "I think I need to wash myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh." He nods. "You *really, really..."
links.text: "Oh." He nods. "You *really, really* do. I am glad to hear you say that. Your room in the Whirling-in-Rags should come with a bathroom. Be sure to make use of it in the evening."

links.title: You: ""Maybe the bullet holds more answer..."
links.text: "Maybe the bullet holds more answers?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. We should take a closer look..."
links.text: "Yes. We should take a closer look at it. I am certain it has more to tell us."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This little thing could reveal much..."
links.text: This little thing could reveal much about the weapon that shot it.

links.title: You: ""What happens next?" (Proceed.)"
links.text: "What happens next?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We bag the corpse and carry him to..."
links.text: "We bag the corpse and carry him to the holding pen of my Kineema. I can transport him to Processing myself, but I *will* be gone for the rest of the day."

links.title: You: ""You'll be gone? What should I do i..."
links.text: "You'll be gone? What should I do in the meanwhile?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Work on the case, tend to personal..."
links.text: "Work on the case, tend to personal matters? Try not to do anything too dangerous. An officer needs backup in a neighbourhood like this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll leave that choice to you. And..."
links.text: "I'll leave that choice to you. And one more thing..." He looks you in the eye. "Great work, detective."

links.title: Authority: "The word lingers in the air of the..."
links.text: The word lingers in the air of the basement, far away ice cream makers are buzzing and the sea wind blows outside...

links.title: Authority: "*Detective*."
links.text: *Detective*.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "After you bag the corpse, Lieutenan..."
links.text: After you bag the corpse, Lieutenant Kitsuragi will leave the party until tomorrow morning. You can do side-tasks and even the main case, but it might be more difficult. Plan his exit accordingly.

links.title: Authority: "The word lingers in the air of the..."
links.text: The word lingers in the air of the yard, far away dogs are barking, further yet the sound of motor traffic...

links.title: Authority: "*Detective*."
links.text: *Detective*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We put him in a bag and carry him..."
links.text: "We put him in a bag and carry him to the holding pen of my Kineema. The bodybag should contain the odour for the duration of the transport..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I *would* drive him to Processing,..."
links.text: "I *would* drive him to Processing, but it's too late to do that today... I'll do it first thing tomorrow. No problem."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One more thing -- this was *really..."
links.text: "One more thing -- this was *really* good work, detective."

links.title: Authority: "The word lingers in the air of base..."
links.text: The word lingers in the air of basement, far away ice cream makers are buzzing and the sea wind blows outside...

links.title: Authority: "*Detective*."
links.text: *Detective*.

links.title: Authority: "The word lingers in the air of the..."
links.text: The word lingers in the air of the yard, as far away dogs are barking, further yet the sound of motor traffic...

links.title: Authority: "*Detective*."
links.text: *Detective*.

links.title: You: ""Maybe they just shot him *while* t..."
links.text: "Maybe they just shot him *while* they hanged him?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To put him out of his misery?" He..."
links.text: "To put him out of his misery?" He thinks. "It's possible, but it does not explain all the other dubious things here -- lack of struggle primarily. I may be intellectually sloppy, but I prefer one theory at a time. And this just smacks of treatment to me."

links.title: You: ""Who would do this?""
links.text: "Who would do this?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's for us to find out. But *th..."
links.text: "That's for us to find out. But *this* -- it will make finding them just a little easier."

links.title: You: ""Why would anyone do this?""
links.text: "Why would anyone do this?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To hide something. The real killer..."
links.text: "To hide something. The real killer? The real motivation? What really happened here."

links.title: You: ""We should have known.""
links.text: "We should have known."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "I had my doubts --  there..."
links.text: He nods. "I had my doubts --  there were no signs of a struggle on his hands. No claw marks on his neck. But still..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "His brow furrows while his eyes gla..."
links.text: His brow furrows while his eyes glaze over. The lieutenant looks regretful for not figuring this out before.

links.title: Logic: "He's proposing the bullet was the r..."
links.text: He's proposing the bullet was the real cause of death -- and the hanging an attempt to *conceal* this fact.

links.title: You: ""Treatment?""
links.text: "Treatment?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As I said, treatment is an attempt..."
links.text: "As I said, treatment is an attempt to manipulate the body after death -- to hide the real cause with a *false* cause. In this case..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...*this* injury here." He points..."
links.text: "...*this* injury here." He points to the mark encircling the corpse's neck.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Treatment, officer, is an attempt..."
links.text: "Treatment, officer, is an attempt to manipulate the body after death -- to hide the real cause with a *false* cause. In this case..."

links.title: You: ""The ligament mark, the fractured h..."
links.text: "The ligament mark, the fractured hyoid bone, it was all treatment..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. And the belt around his neck;..."
links.text: "Yes. And the belt around his neck; the hanging; even dragging him to the yard... *all* of it was done after this man was already dead."

links.title: You: ""Dead, daba-doop-doop.""
links.text: "Dead, daba-doop-doop."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Deadady-dead-dead.""
links.text: "Deadady-dead-dead."

links.title: You: ""You think so?""
links.text: "You think so?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did not *just* come up with this..."
links.text: "I did not *just* come up with this. I've had my doubts since we found no signs of struggle on his wrists. No claw marks on his neck -- why? Why didn't he fight for his life?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There have been other signs too, s..."
links.text: "There have been other signs too, small details. Everything is too neatly designed for us to assign probable cause here. As we did, foolhardily. Well -- no more."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "We almost fell for it, he thinks. *..."
links.text: We almost fell for it, he thinks. *Almost*.

links.title: Logic: "There is of course the very real po..."
links.text: There is of course the very real possibility he was both shot *and* hanged.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There have been other signs too, s..."
links.text: "There have been other signs too, small things. We were right not to assign hanging as cause of death. As the perpetrators *expected* we would -- no such luck for them."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "We didn't fall for it, he thinks. T..."
links.text: We didn't fall for it, he thinks. There's pride in there.

links.title: You: ""Agreed.""
links.text: "Agreed."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have had my doubts for a while n..."
links.text: "I have had my doubts for a while now. Since I saw there were no signs of struggle on his hands. And no claw marks on his neck..."

links.title: You: ""Aren't we jumping to conclusions?""
links.text: "Aren't we jumping to conclusions?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have had this doubt since I insp..."
links.text: "I have had this doubt since I inspected his hands, officer -- there were no signs of struggle. No claw marks on his neck. Why? Why didn't he fight for his life?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He's proposing the bullet was the r..."
links.text: He's proposing the bullet was the real cause of death -- and the hanging an attempt to *conceal* this fact.

links.title: You: ""Agreed.""
links.text: "Agreed."

links.title: You: ""God damn right.""
links.text: "God damn right."

links.title: You: ""Wasn't that what we thought the la..."
links.text: "Wasn't that what we thought the last time?" (Clean your hand in the snow.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That was then. This time we have e..."
links.text: "That was then. This time we have extensive tissue destruction away from the wound track. This time we have a *bullet*."

links.title: You: ""I'm *still* not sure." (Look at yo..."
links.text: "I'm *still* not sure." (Look at your hand, quizzically.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have *extensive* tissue destruc..."
links.text: "We have *extensive* tissue destruction away from the wound track -- we have a *bullet*."

links.title: You: ""Correct.""
links.text: "Correct."

links.title: You: "Say nothing, just nod."
links.text: Say nothing, just nod.

links.title: You: ""Sounds about right.""
links.text: "Sounds about right."

links.title: You: ""Keep it, lieutenant. As a gift.""
links.text: "Keep it, lieutenant. As a gift."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No-no, you deserve it. We can log..."
links.text: "No-no, you deserve it. We can log it later." The lieutenant drops the bag in your bloody hand. It feels light.

links.title: You: ""Keep it, lieutenant. Also, I'm sor..."
links.text: "Keep it, lieutenant. Also, I'm sorry for calling you a binoclard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't be silly." A smile comes acr..."
links.text: "Don't be silly." A smile comes across his face. "You've earned it. Consider the binoclard episode forgotten." The lieutenant drops the bag in your bloody hand. It feels light.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fucking *beautiful...*""
links.text: "Fucking *beautiful...*"

links.title: Interfacing: "You push your hand further in. What..."
links.text: You push your hand further in. Whatever is in there keeps rolling between your fingers as you beckon it to come out.

links.title: You: ""Fucking shit.""
links.text: "Fucking shit."

links.title: You: ""A little help, lieutenant?""
links.text: "A little help, lieutenant?"

links.title: You: ""I can't get it...""
links.text: "I can't get it..."

links.title: You: "No, this is too much. (Pull your ha..."
links.text: No, this is too much. (Pull your hand out.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, detective!" Just as you star..."
links.text: "Wait, detective!" Just as you start to slide your fingers out...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Out comes his small folding knife -..."
links.text: Out comes his small folding knife -- the lieutenant moves its blade across the man's skull, searching for the exit wound...

links.title: You: ""There." (Nod toward the protrusion..."
links.text: "There." (Nod toward the protrusion.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm. Withdraw your hand 4 centimet..."
links.text: "Mhm. Withdraw your hand 4 centimetres please."

links.title: You: "Pull your fingers back and nod."
links.text: Pull your fingers back and nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "With a *crack* he punches the knife..."
links.text: With a *crack* he punches the knife in the skull. Then one more time -- and one more -- until the bone comes loose like eggshell. Inside you feel the jelly move from his poking. The object is still under your finger.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Can you push it out?""
links.text: "Can you push it out?"

links.title: You: "Push."
links.text: Push.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "A small flower of metal blossoms fr..."
links.text: A small flower of metal blossoms from the man's head, followed by your finger.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A bullet." The lieutenant picks it..."
links.text: "A bullet." The lieutenant picks it up between his fingers. "Unknown calibre. Rifled... you may remove your hand from the victim's head now, officer -- well done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Here's your prize." He drops the b..."
links.text: "Here's your prize." He drops the bullet in an evidence bag and puts it in your hand -- your other hand, the one *not* covered in blood and cerebral cortex.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Beautiful...""
links.text: "Beautiful..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh yeah...""
links.text: "Oh yeah..."

links.title: You: ""I feel a solid object, right under..."
links.text: "I feel a solid object, right under the skull."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Can you... can you get to it?" He..."
links.text: "Can you... can you get to it?" He searches his pockets for something.

links.title: You: "Inspect the skull first."
links.text: Inspect the skull first.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There's a tiny crack, a protrusion..."
links.text: There's a tiny crack, a protrusion in the cranium, right in the back of his head. Your finger must be pointing straight at it. From the *inside*.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The object that is in there stopped..."
links.text: The object that is in there stopped just short of the skull, in the encephalus, knocking this tiny fracture into the cranium...

links.title: Interfacing: "This is the *irregularity* you felt..."
links.text: This is the *irregularity* you felt before. The one that was too tiny to register consciously.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have the makings of a... very s..."
links.text: "We have the makings of a... very small exit wound here." The lieutenant leans closer.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Forget about the *fucking exit wou..."
links.text: "Forget about the *fucking exit wound*, bino! THE PIG IS WEARING HIM LIKE A FUCK PUPPET!"

links.title: Suggestion: "Her voice is absolutely sizzling wi..."
links.text: Her voice is absolutely sizzling with excitement.

links.title: You: "Wriggle in..."
links.text: Wriggle in...

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Your fingers reach toward his skull..."
links.text: Your fingers reach toward his skull. His cerebral cortex feels like jelly -- cold jelly -- strange fluid streams down your wrist as you push deeper. Until you feel it, on the tip of your finger...

links.title: Cunoesse: ""The fuck is happening?!""
links.text: "The fuck is happening?!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh shit, C...""
links.text: "Oh shit, C..."

links.title: You: "No. Touch something else."
links.text: No. Touch something else.

links.title: You: "Crawl up his nostrils."
links.text: Crawl up his nostrils.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "They are swollen shut -- you need t..."
links.text: They are swollen shut -- you need to really *push* to get in.

links.title: You: "Push your fingers in his nose."
links.text: Push your fingers in his nose.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Only the little one fits. The flesh..."
links.text: Only the little one fits. The flesh changes shape as you bore in, searching for something in the cartilage.

links.title: Perception: "The thing you're looking for -- it'..."
links.text: The thing you're looking for -- it's not there. Crawl out, spider...

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck is he doing?" You hear a..."
links.text: "The fuck is he doing?" You hear a voice squeak. It sounds very far away.

links.title: You: "Touch something else."
links.text: Touch something else.

links.title: Interfacing: "You're not far, it'll come to you,..."
links.text: You're not far, it'll come to you, keep crawling...

links.title: You: "Squeeze his nose."
links.text: Squeeze his nose.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You pick it between your fingers. T..."
links.text: You pick it between your fingers. The mass feels large, very porous somehow. Keep crawling, lest you break it...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Suddenly, you recall: Two officers..."
links.text: Suddenly, you recall: Two officers must be present for a field autopsy. You take your hand from the dead man's face and open your eyes. You will still need to come back with the lieutenant.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "This means Lieutenant Kitsuragi wil..."
links.text: This means Lieutenant Kitsuragi will leave until tomorrow morning. Meanwhile, you're free to do side-tasks and even the main case -- though it might be more difficult.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "If you have nothing to do, read boo..."
links.text: If you have nothing to do, read books or sit on the bench on the plaza.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I will need a little help carrying..."
links.text: "I will need a little help carrying him -- you take the hands, I'll take the legs."

links.title: You: "Bag the corpse and drag it to the m..."
links.text: Bag the corpse and drag it to the motor carriage. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Bag the corpse and drag it to the m..."
links.text: Bag the corpse and drag it to the motor carriage. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Perception: "You touch the dead man's body. His..."
dialogueTree.text: You touch the dead man's body. His skin is cold, light blue and silvery in the light of the fridge. You *still* have no idea where to begin -- or what to even do with him...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Klaasje told us the bullet hit him..."
links.text: "Klaasje told us the bullet hit him in the mouth -- try putting your hand there..."

links.title: Authority: "It seems he is leaving you no choic..."
links.text: It seems he is leaving you no choice in the matter.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If the Hardies are to be trusted,..."
links.text: "If the Hardies are to be trusted, there should be a bullet in there..." The lieutenant looks at you. "Try putting your hand in his mouth and probing for the bullet in his head."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant should *clearly* be..."
links.text: The lieutenant should *clearly* be here for this. You're lost.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant rubs his side for wa..."
links.text: The lieutenant rubs his side for warmth. "It'll come to you sooner or later. At least he's safe here until then."

dialogueTree.title: Perception: "You really ought to wait until the..."
dialogueTree.text: You really ought to wait until the cadaver is *refrigerated*. Digging around in this mess now is proving hopelessly difficult.

dialogueTree.title: Perception: "You run your hands over the victim'..."
dialogueTree.text: You run your hands over the victim's cold body: his limbs, his torso with its swollen organs... maybe you should be more *thorough*?

links.title: You: "Look in his pants again."
links.text: Look in his pants again.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You pull down his breeches. Marblin..."
links.text: You pull down his breeches. Marbling is present around the crotch. The penis has shrunk, crawling half way back inside him. There is nothing mysterious or noteworthy here.

links.title: You: "Maybe if I touch it again..."
links.text: Maybe if I touch it again...

links.title: Cuno: ""I can't believe the pig is strokin..."
links.text: "I can't believe the pig is stroking him *again*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no need. We have been tho..."
links.text: "There is no need. We have been thorough with the genitals..." The lieutenant looks worried.

links.title: You: "Don't touch it again."
links.text: Don't touch it again.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fucking pig's probably thinking ab..."
links.text: "Fucking pig's probably thinking about touching it again..."

links.title: Cuno: ""F****ts can't get enough of that d..."
links.text: "F****ts can't get enough of that dick..."

links.title: You: "Look under his fingernails, like Ki..."
links.text: Look under his fingernails, like Kim already did.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "His fingernails have turned dark. T..."
links.text: His fingernails have turned dark. They're chipped and quite long. There is dirt under them. That's all.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you think we missed something?""
links.text: "Do you think we missed something?"

links.title: You: ""We still haven't found the *bullet..."
links.text: "We still haven't found the *bullet*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And, if we are to believe Hardie b..."
links.text: "And, if we are to believe Hardie boys, it's somewhere in there..."

links.title: You: ""But where?""
links.text: "But where?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Klaasje told us the bullet hit him..."
links.text: "Klaasje told us the bullet hit him in the *mouth* -- try putting your hand there..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He frowns, thinking. "Try putting y..."
links.text: He frowns, thinking. "Try putting your hand in his mouth and probing for the bullet in his *head*."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You can't shake the feeling that th..."
links.text: You can't shake the feeling that there are more secrets concealed in the flesh before you.

links.title: You: ""Yes. There's something we're not s..."
links.text: "Yes. There's something we're not seeing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, well... We're in livor morti..."
links.text: "Okay, well... We're in livor mortis here. He's disintegrating. We need to *refrigerate* the body, if we want to conduct another examination -- and we need to do it fast."

links.title: You: ""Can't he just... hang out here for..."
links.text: "Can't he just... hang out here for a while longer?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you want for this task to slowl..."
links.text: "If you want for this task to slowly become impossible, then yes. Otherwise -- no. He's been *hanging out* far too long already. We need to ice him."

links.title: Authority: "Not to mention the damage that woul..."
links.text: Not to mention the damage that would be dealt to the force's reputation by the corpse just rotting here like this...

links.title: You: ""Okay -- where do we find a fridge..."
links.text: "Okay -- where do we find a fridge for the body?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hey..." A wide smile appears on hi..."
links.text: "Hey..." A wide smile appears on his face. "Wasn't there a *giant ice bear sarcophagus* below that building?" He points toward the commercial area.

links.title: Half Light: "Why yes there was. It was massive...."
links.text: Why yes there was. It was massive. Red eyes glowing in the dark.

links.title: You: ""Why... yes there was.""
links.text: "Why... yes there was."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, detective... I've rarely been..."
links.text: "Now, detective... I've rarely been disappointed by the size of a *giant* ice bear fridge, but I think we should still take a look at it first. Make sure it's big *enough* before we carry him over."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He closes his notebook and cracks h..."
links.text: He closes his notebook and cracks his neck. "Let's move. With every hour, whatever we're looking for in the deceased will become harder to find."

links.title: You: ""An absolutely colossal fridge -- s..."
links.text: "An absolutely colossal fridge -- still plugged in -- *literally* in the shape of an ice bear!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- now. I've rarely been disap..."
links.text: "Yes -- now. I've rarely been disappointed by the size of a *giant* ice bear fridge, but I think we should still take a look at it first. Make sure it's big *enough* before we carry him over."

links.title: You: ""So that's what the *ice bear shape..."
links.text: "So that's what the *ice bear shaped* refrigerator is for!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now that's an overstatement. It's..."
links.text: "Now that's an overstatement. It's not actually *for* storing cadavers, or at least I hope so. I think we should take a look at it first. Make sure it's big *enough* before we carry him over."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would have to be *industrial* i..."
links.text: "It would have to be *industrial* in size. Let's start by asking the proprietor of the Whirling-in-Rags, then the Frittte store down at the gates. And if neither has one..." His voice trails off -- and his gaze settles on *Cuno*.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck are you looking at bino-man?..."
links.text: "Fuck are you looking at bino-man? You wanna piece of the Cuno? Wanna get *fucked*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Only if *all else* fails," he stre..."
links.text: "Only if *all else* fails," he stresses.

links.title: Logic: "Hmm... Cuno looks like he gets arou..."
links.text: Hmm... Cuno looks like he gets around. *Knows* Martinaise. And its fridges too probably...

links.title: Logic: "Or -- remember the buttons on that..."
links.text: Or -- remember the buttons on that intercom over there, on the side of the building next to the Whirling? One was for "Revachol *Ice* City"? Perhaps it's a... clue?

links.title: You: ""I need to take another look at the..."
links.text: "I need to take another look at the body first."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hurry. This is one task we *cannot..."
links.text: "Hurry. This is one task we *cannot* sideline. With every hour, whatever we're looking for will become harder to find."

links.title: Endurance: "Soon you'll be looking for clues in..."
links.text: Soon you'll be looking for clues in a pile of sludge and bones.

links.title: You: ""Let's hurry then." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's hurry then." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." He gets up. "This is one tas..."
links.text: "Mhm." He gets up. "This is one task we *cannot* sideline. With every hour, whatever we're looking for will become harder to find."

links.title: You: ""I've got a gut feeling that there'..."
links.text: "I've got a gut feeling that there's more to this corpse."

links.title: You: ""No, let's just leave it to the Pro..."
links.text: "No, let's just leave it to the Processing guys."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He shakes his head. "I worked as on..."
links.text: He shakes his head. "I worked as one of these *Processing guys* for a year. They are butchers and clowns. I once saw twenty CODs go misidentified in one week. Chances are slim to none that they'll find anything useful in processing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In short, you and I are the *last*..."
links.text: "In short, you and I are the *last* line of detection. If you're not sure we got everything, we need to look *again*. And for that -- we need to refrigerate the corpse."

links.title: You: "Give up."
links.text: Give up.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse seems to yawn contentedl..."
links.text: The corpse seems to yawn contentedly, as though its glad you've run out of steam.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You can almost see the body decompo..."
links.text: You can almost see the body decomposing before your very eyes. You should drop everything else and look for a way to preserve it so you can conduct your examination better.

links.title: You: "What about that giant ice bear frid..."
links.text: What about that giant ice bear fridge in the Doomed Commercial Area?

links.title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse looks *enormous* with it..."
links.text: The corpse looks *enormous* with its bloated belly. Was the ice bear fridge really that giant? You should go and measure it, just to be sure.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "You can almost see the body decompo..."
links.text: You can almost see the body decomposing before your very eyes. You should drop everything else and look for a way to preserve it so you can conduct your examination better.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Meanwhile, the lieutenant is sittin..."
links.text: Meanwhile, the lieutenant is sitting behind his desk, hunched over a stack of paperwork. His help would be invaluable right now.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." He takes out a shiny b..."
dialogueTree.text: "All right." He takes out a shiny black body bag and starts pulling the plastic over the dead man's face.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There go those beautiful enamel boo..."
links.text: There go those beautiful enamel boots. You will never own the full set now. May they rest in Processing...

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh well -- in another lifetime."
links.text: Oh well -- in another lifetime.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There go those beautiful enamel boo..."
links.text: There go those beautiful enamel boots. May they rest in Processing...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can drive him to Processing toda..."
links.text: "I can drive him to Processing today, no problem. Since we stalled with this... But this *does* mean I will be gone for the rest of the day."

links.title: You: ""You'll be gone? What should I do i..."
links.text: "You'll be gone? What should I do in the meanwhile?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Work on the case, tend to personal..."
links.text: "Work on the case, tend to personal matters? Try not to do anything *too* dangerous. An officer needs backup in a neighbourhood like this."

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." He takes out a shiny b..."
dialogueTree.text: "All right." He takes out a shiny black body bag and starts pulling the plastic over the dead man's face.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." He takes out a shiny b..."
dialogueTree.text: "All right." He takes out a shiny black body bag and starts pulling the plastic over the dead man's face.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." He takes out a shiny b..."
dialogueTree.text: "All right." He takes out a shiny black body bag and starts pulling the plastic over the dead man's face.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you think so, officer." He nods..."
dialogueTree.text: "If you think so, officer." He nods. "I am not going to object."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He unrolls the plastic. "I need a l..."
links.text: He unrolls the plastic. "I need a little help for carrying him to the holding pen of my Kineema. I'll take it from there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He unrolls the plastic. "I need a l..."
links.text: He unrolls the plastic. "I need a little help for carrying him to the holding pen of my Kineema. I'll take it from there."

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." He unrolls the plastic. "I..."
dialogueTree.text: "Okay." He unrolls the plastic. "I need a little help for carrying him to the holding pen of my Kineema. I can take care of the rest."

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There go those beautiful enamel boo..."
links.text: There go those beautiful enamel boots. You will never own the full set now. May they rest in Processing...

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh well -- in another lifetime."
links.text: Oh well -- in another lifetime.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "There go those beautiful enamel boo..."
links.text: There go those beautiful enamel boots. May they rest in Processing...

links.title: You: ""What should I do in the meanwhile?""
links.text: "What should I do in the meanwhile?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Continue working here. The locals,..."
links.text: "Continue working here. The locals, the case, or tend to your own business? I will meet you downstairs in the Whirling-in-Rags, tomorrow morning -- 7:30 sharp."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "This means Lieutenant Kitsuragi wil..."
links.text: This means Lieutenant Kitsuragi will leave the party until tomorrow morning. You're free to do side-tasks and even the main case -- though it might be more difficult.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "If you have nothing to do, read boo..."
links.text: If you have nothing to do, read books or sit on the bench on the plaza.

links.title: You: ""Then what?""
links.text: "Then what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's too late to take him into Pro..."
links.text: "It's too late to take him into Processing today. I'll take him first thing tomorrow." He pulls the black plastic over the dead man's face.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." He unrolls the plastic. "I..."
dialogueTree.text: "Okay." He unrolls the plastic. "I need a little help for carrying him to the holding pen of my Kineema. I can take care of the rest."
